;;; TOOL: wat2wasm
;;; ERROR: 1
;; bug where looking up an undefined name would not produce an error if there
;; was any name at all.
(module
  (func (param $p i32)
    (get_local $n)))
(;; STDERR ;;;
out/test/regress/regress-4.txt:7:16: error: undefined local variable "$n"
    (get_local $n)))
               ^^
;;; STDERR ;;)
